features: 🌸[DIMENSION & QUANTITY] 48 sheets 100gsm heavy weight floral stationery papers – A4 size: 8.27 x 11.69 inch (210 x 297 mm) & 24 Pieces 120gsm Extra Weight self-sticking envelopes - 8.9 x 4.3 inch (109 x 225 mm). Made by natural wood pulp and natural ink material - safety, recycle, non-toxic & environment friendly. Standard A4 copy paper size compatible with Laser or inkjet printers.

🌸[ RECYCLABLE, DUPLEX & THICKNESS] Professional offset printing & coloring on both sides of the letter. Heavy weight thick & smooth finished calligraphy papers are no problem with eraser, fountain pen, marker & gel, featuring bleed proof & preventing feathering & ghosting.

🌸[INDIVIDUAL PACK] Each individual poly baggie contains 48 pieces of papers & 24 Self-adhesive envelops, total 6 baggies in 1 pack with assorted 【ORIGNAL DESIGNER ARTWORK】 elegant eastern style design letter papers.

🎅[MULTIPURPOSE]: Perfect for wedding invitation, placeholding, Christmas music sheet, handwriting, eastern style party decoration, Flyers, Mother’s Day, Children’s Day, business invitations, party invitations, bless message & much more. Start writing your old-fashioned letters on Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Easter or any occasion!
🌸[30 DAYS GUARANTEE] Please email us for any issues regarding to the products. Our service team is committing to you warranty with 100% satisfaction & 30 days guarantee money back.
body.description: Why choose us?The flower and landscape stationery paper and envelopes have unique nice touching and very distinctive design. Exclusive high-quality material, luxury pack.Independent PackagingEach design of papers and envelops was individually wrapped with protective poly sleeve.Self-Sealing Envelopes: Save Your TimeDays of envelopes without glue are gone. Our envelops have great customer comments about the self-sticker tape which are very convenient and save time. Multiple Use! Popular Style! You can use our traditional ink printed eastern styles stationary on any occasion: handwriting, mailing, art project, DIY, calligraphy, special illustration etc. Eco-Friendly: ANZON MORIES Stationary papers are made by nartrual wood pulp paper material (100% recyclable and non-toxic), soy based ink and water based coating which 100% safe and environmental friendlySpecification and DetailMaterial: 100 GSM Heavy Weight Smooth Uncoated Paper and 120 GSM Extra Weight Envelope (Recyclable) Size: Stationery Paper - 8.27" x 11.69" (210 x 297 mm), Self-Adhesived Envelope - 8.9" x 4.3" (109 x 225 mm) Package include: Chrysanthemum: 8 x letter papers & 4 x envelops Plum blossom: 8 x letter papers & 4 x envelops Rose: 8 x letter papers & 4 x envelops Rosa multiflora: 8 x letter papers & 4 x envelops Althaea rosea: 8 x letter papers & 4 x envelops Pomegranate flower: 8 x letter papers & 4 x envelops Contact us for any questions, ANZON MORIES US team are committing to 100% satisfaction. You Could Check Out the Real Product in a few Days And Decide for An Unconditonal Return and Refund in 30-day after purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the different designs and colors to match the mood of my letters.Well done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: i think these beautiful papers with matching envelopes are PERFECT ! the stationery is LINED ON BOTH SIDES !!! the images are BEAUTIFUL ! the matching envelopes just puts it all over the top! my mom loved receiving this as a birthday present and said i finally gave her something she will use !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL AND PRACTICAL
reviews.reviewText: IF YOU ARE LIKE ME AND CAN'T WRITE IN A STRAIGHT LINE TO SAVE YOUR LIFE, THIS IS FOR YOU.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is beautiful stationary with matching envelopes. Good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the fanciest paper but very pretty
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to use as notes from the Easter Bunny for a scavenger hunt for my daughter. I wanted some pretty springtime/floral paper and envelopes. These definitely met my expectations. The prints on the paper and matching envelopes were really pretty, and my daughter enjoyed finding the notes and talking about the colors and flowers. The paper isn't very heavy or particularly great for writing. But it met my needs, and I'll definitely use it for other things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved the envelopes and quality of paper was really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lined and attractive Liked the
reviews.reviewText: Liked that it is lined with plenty of room to write.Soft colors in the writing area to more vibrant on the edges.Looked a long time before finding this paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I shared this with someone else. I have enjoyed what I kept.
I like the vintage floral writing paper with pretty designs and colors. I I may use the sheets of paper to write something like thank-you notes and other things.
Très jolie papier. Très bonne qualité.Je recommande.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I hate rough writing paper. This is super smooth so I enjoy writing on it.
Il prodotto è conforme alla descrizione. Carta di un buono spessore e grafica graziosa. Consigliato.
